sections.analytics: Analytics & Reporting hmanga thil tih a ni

overview.intro: Platform administrator i nih angin Contentry platform pumpui enkawl leh enkawlna atana hmanraw kimchang tak i nei thei a ni. He guide hian i administrative theihna i hriatthiam theih nan a pui ang che.
overview.dashboardDesc: Admin Dashboard hian platform activity leh hriselna te chu bird’s-eye view a pe a ni.
overview.feature1: User-te thiltih dan enfiahna (real-time) a ni
overview.feature3: System hriselna leh hnathawh dan tehfung
overview.feature4: Administrative function pawimawh tak tak te chu rang taka hman theih a ni
overview.tip: Platform trend chungchang hriat reng nan leh harsatna awm thei te hriat hmasak nan Admin Dashboard tlawh fo thin ang che.

userManagement.intro: User management hi core administrative function a ni a, platform chhunga user leh enterprise zawng zawng enkawl theihna a ni.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Platform hmangtu zawng zawng en, zawn leh enkawl turin User Management section ah lut la.
userManagement.feature1: User te hming, email, emaw role emaw hmangin zawng la, filter rawh
userManagement.feature2: User profile leh activity history kimchang zawk en rawh
userManagement.feature3: User role leh phalna te siam danglam
userManagement.feature4: A tul hunah user account deactivate emaw delete emaw theih a ni
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry hian primary user role pathum a nei a, chungte chu:
userManagement.role1: Admin: System configuration theihna nei full platform access a awm bawk
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: An company team leh settings te a enkawl thin
userManagement.role3: User: Standard content siam leh thlirletna features
userManagement.warning: User role thlak emaw account delete emaw hmain impact hi verify fo thin ang che. Heng thiltih te hian team workflow a nghawng thei a ni.

analytics.intro: Analytics hian enterprise leh user zawng zawngah he platform hi engtin nge an hman tih hriatna thuk tak a pe a ni.
analytics.metric1: Active users zawng zawng leh growth trend te
analytics.metric5: Enterprise hrang hranga compliance leh risk score te
analytics.tip: Download Report feature hmangin stakeholder-te presentation atan analytics report export rawh.

financials.intro: Financial Overview section hian platform atanga sum hmuh leh subscription metrics te hmuh theihna a pe a ni.
financials.revenueTitle: Revenue & Subscription te pawh a awm bawk
financials.revenueDesc: Enterprise zawng zawnga sum leh pai hriselna leh subscription kalphung enfiah.
financials.feature1: Thla tin recurring revenue (MRR) tracking neih thin a ni
financials.feature2: Subscription tier atanga sem chhuah a ni
financials.feature3: Credit hman dan leh thil lei tawh dan

systemConfig.intro: System configuration hmang hian platform pum huapa setting leh integration te chu i enkawl thei a ni.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Third-party integration te configure leh monitor:
systemConfig.integration1: Social media hmanga tihchhuahna atana Ayrshare API
systemConfig.integration2: Content siam leh thlirletna atana AI services te
systemConfig.integration3: Stripe hmanga pawisa pek dan tur
systemConfig.tip: Production settings tihdanglam hmain staging environment-ah integrations test fo thin ang che.

sections.billing: Billing & Subscription te pawh a awm bawk

gettingStarted.intro: Contentry ah hian kan lo lawm a che! Enterprise Administrator i nih angin i team enkawl dan tur, content guidelines siam tur leh brand consistency enfiahna tur hmanrua i nei a ni.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: I enterprise account set up nan heng step te hi zawm rawh:
gettingStarted.step1: Settings > Enterprise ah kal la, i company dashboard ah lut rawh
gettingStarted.step2: I company brand guidelines leh policy te chu Knowledge Base ah upload rawh
gettingStarted.step3: I team member te sawm la, hna \ha tak tak pe rawh
gettingStarted.step4: Content review atan approval workflows configure rawh
gettingStarted.tip: Team member te sawm hmain i Knowledge Base setup kha tifel la, ni khatna atang khan brand guidelines an neih theih nan.

teamManagement.intro: Team management tha tak hian i pawl chhungah thawhhona tha tak leh access control tha tak a siam a ni.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: I enterprise team-ah member thar dah la:
teamManagement.feature1: Team member email address kha ziak lut rawh
teamManagement.feature2: An hnathawh tur (Creator, Manager, emaw Admin) thlang rawh .
teamManagement.feature3: Sawmnaah hian optional personal message dah belh rawh
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Mawhphurhna a zirin chanvo ruat rawh:
teamManagement.role1: Siamtu: Content siamin pawmpuina atan a submit thei
teamManagement.role2: Manager: Content approve/reject thei leh creator te enkawl thei
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Billing leh settings telin enterprise access kimchang
teamManagement.tip: Invitation hi ni 7 hnuah a tawp thin. Team member-te chu an sawmnate pawm thuai turin hriattir rawh.

knowledgeBase.intro: Knowledge Base hi i company-a brand guidelines, policy leh content rules te dahna hmunpui ber a ni. Heta document upload te hian team member zawng zawng tan AI-generated content a hriattir thin.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Content siamna atana kaihruaitu tur document te dah belh rawh:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Brand style kaihhruaina leh aw kaihhruaina
knowledgeBase.docType2: Dan leh zawm dan tur ruahmanna siam
knowledgeBase.docType3: Social media-a post dan tur kaihhruaina
knowledgeBase.tip: I brand guidelines pawimawh ber berte upload hmasa phawt ang che. AI hian company Knowledge Base-a document awmte chu user pakhat zel upload aiin a dah pawimawh zawk a ni.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Approval workflow hian content zawng zawng chu i company standard a tlin vek tih a tichiang a, chu chu i tihchhuah hmain a ni.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Content hi heng stage hrang hrangah hian a luang chhuak thin:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Creator hian content a siam emaw, a zirchiang emaw thin
approvalWorkflow.step2: Content chu pawmpuina atan (a tul chuan) thehluh a ni .
approvalWorkflow.step3: Manager hian a enfiah a, feedback a pe bawk
approvalWorkflow.step4: Approved content hi social platform-ah tihchhuah theih a ni
approvalWorkflow.warning: Settings-a approval requirements enable la, content zawng zawng chu publish hmaa enfiah vek a nih theih nan.

billing.intro: I enterprise subscription enkawl la, credit hman dan enfiah rawh.
billing.feature1: Tuna plan details leh credit pek dan tur
billing.feature2: Usage history leh credit la awm te
billing.feature3: Invoice history leh pawisa pek dan tur

sections.strategicProfiles: Strategic Profiles te pawh a awm
sections.socialAccounts: Social Account hrang hrangah a awm

gettingStarted.intro: Contentry ah hian kan lo lawm a che! He guide hian AI-powered tools hmanga compelling, compliant content siam turin a pui ang che.
gettingStarted.firstStepsDesc: Contentry atang hian tan la rawh:
gettingStarted.step1: I profile chu information dik tak nen set up rawh
gettingStarted.step2: Social media account te chu connect rawh
gettingStarted.step3: I brand emaw campaign emaw atan Strategic Profile siam rawh
gettingStarted.step4: I content hmasa ber siam rawh
gettingStarted.tip: I content zawng zawng hian tone leh messaging mumal tak a neih theih nan Strategic Profile hmangin tan la rawh.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry hian AI hmanga content generation a siam hian second tlemte chhungin post ngaihnawm tak tak siam turin a pui che a ni.
contentCreation.feature1: I post duh chungchang sawifiahna topic emaw prompt emaw ziak la
contentCreation.feature2: I target platform (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, etc.) te thlang rawh
contentCreation.feature3: I duhzawng ziakna tone thlang rawh
contentCreation.feature4: A duh chuan accompanying image siam rawh
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: I content calendar kha ruahman la:
contentCreation.schedule2: Automatic posting atan ni leh hun bik thlang rawh
contentCreation.schedule3: Publish hmain auto-posting emaw manual review emaw enable rawh
contentCreation.tip: Marketing post siam dawnin ‘Promotional Content’ checkbox hmang la, compliance analysis-in promotional guidelines a ngaihtuah tih chian nan.

analyzeContent.intro: Analyze Content feature hian i content chu compliance, culture sensitivity, leh brand alignment te a enfiah thin.
analyzeContent.step1: Content Moderation > Content thlirletna ah kal rawh
analyzeContent.step2: I content chu text area ah paste rawh
analyzeContent.step3: Context atan Strategic Profile thlang rawh
analyzeContent.step4: Analyze kha click la, feedback kimchang i dawng ang
analyzeContent.type2: Hmun hrang hranga culture sensitivity awm
analyzeContent.type3: Brand aw leh tone a inmil thei
analyzeContent.type4: Risk awm thei leh rawtna te
analyzeContent.tip: Pawn lam platform-a i tihchhuah hmain content hi thlirlet fo thin la, a bik takin region hrang hrang target-a campaign-naah chuan.

strategicProfiles.intro: Strategic Profiles hian content siam leh thlirletna atana context, tone leh guidelines te a sawifiah a.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Profile-a target audience leh thiltum sawifiah rawh
strategicProfiles.feature2: Cultural leh regional ngaihtuah tur siam rawh
strategicProfiles.feature3: Profile bik document leh kaihhruaina upload rawh
strategicProfiles.feature4: Default tone leh style duhzawng te configure rawh
strategicProfiles.tip: Campaign hrang hrang, brand hrang hrang, emaw regional market hrang hrang tan Strategic Profile hrang hrang siam rawh.

socialAccounts.intro: Contentry atanga direct a content publish theih nan i social media account te connect rawh.
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Mimal leh Company page hrang hrang
socialAccounts.platform3: Facebook - Page leh Group hrang hrang
socialAccounts.warning: Social account connection te chu update reng ang che. Token expire tawh chuan scheduled post te chu a tichhuak thei lo thei a ni.

approvalProcess.intro: I enterprise-in approval workflows enabled a neih chuan content hi publish hmain i enfiah hmasa tur a ni.
approvalProcess.step1: I content siam emaw, thlirlet emaw rawh
approvalProcess.step2: 'Submit for Approval' tih kha click la, i manager hnenah thawn rawh
approvalProcess.step3: Pending Approval queue-a approval dinhmun chu track rawh
approvalProcess.tip: Content i submit dawnin notes te dah la, reviewer te hnenah i creative decisions chungchangah context pe rawh.

aboutGuide.title: About & Thil tih dan tha ber ber
aboutGuide.description: Contentry hi eng atan nge a nih tih zir la, i content siam dan, brand deal leh influencer profile te tihchangtlunna tur kawng tha ber berte hmuchhuak rawh.
aboutGuide.feature3: Brand Deal hman dan tur ruahmanna

sections.bestPractices: Thil tih dan tha ber ber
sections.brandDeals: Brand Deals & Partnership hrang hrang te

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry hi AI hmanga siam content intelligence platform a ni a, content siamtu, marketer leh enterprise te tan compliant content siam, zirchian leh scale-a tihchhuah theihna tura duan a ni. Mimal influencer emaw, marketing team lian takah emaw i tel emaw, Contentry hian i content workflow a ti awlsam a ni.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Content tinte chu on-brand, culture-a sensitive, leh platform guidelines zawm tur atana hmanraw fing tak tak hmanga creator-te tihchak hi kan ring a ni.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: I brand aw nena inmil tur AI hmanga content generation
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Regulatory-a thil tulte chu real-time-a compliance checking neih a ni
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Khawvel pum huapa ngaithlatute tana culture sensitivity thlirletna
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Enterprise team hrang hrangte tana approval workflow siam that
whatIsContentry.tip: Contentry hian AI thiltihtheihna leh mihring enkawlna te chu a thlunzawm a, chu chuan i ngaithlatute rilru hneh thei tur content a pe chhuak a, chutih rualin compliant takin a awm reng bawk.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry hian i content lifecycle zawng zawng enkawlna tur hmanrua kimchang tak a pe a:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: I brand leh audience nena inmil tur content quality sang tak siam rawh:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Platform hrang hranga content siam chhuah (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Thuziak tone siam danglam theih (Professional, Casual, Inspirational) te pawh a awm bawk.
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: I post te nena inzawm tur AI image generation
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: I thuziak hian i tihchhuah hmain thil mamawh zawng zawng a tlin ngei ngei tur a ni:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Company policy nena inmil taka automated compliance checking neih a ni
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: International audience te tan culture sensitivity scoring siam a ni
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Risk assessment hmanga hmalakna tur rawtna siam
keyFeatures.tip: Generated content zawng zawngah brand voice inmil tak neih theih nan Strategic Profiles hmang rawh.

bestPractices.intro: Heng thil tha ber berte zawm hian Contentry atanga hlawkna tam ber i hmuh theih nan leh content performance tha tak siam turin a pui ang che:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Workflow mumal tak chuan quality leh efficiency a tichiang a:
bestPractices.workflow1: Brand guidelines hmanga i Strategic Profile siam atang khan tan la rawh
bestPractices.workflow2: Platform leh audience bik ngaihtuah chungin content siam rawh
bestPractices.workflow3: Pawn lam platform-a i tihchhuah hmain content hi thlirlet fo thin ang che
bestPractices.workflow4: Posting cadence mumal tak neih theih nan scheduling features hmang rawh
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Branding mumal tak hian rinna leh hriat hlawhna a siam a:
bestPractices.consistency1: I brand style guide chu Knowledge Base ah upload rawh
bestPractices.consistency2: Campaign kaihhnawih atan pawh Strategic Profile inang hmang rawh
bestPractices.consistency3: AI hmanga siam content chu i aw nen a inmil em tih enfiah rawh
bestPractices.warning: AI-generated content hi tihchhuah hmain enfiah hmasa phawt ang che. Kan AI hi thiltithei tak a nih laiin, mihring enkawlna hian result tha ber a tichiang a ni.

optimizeContent.intro: Content ropui tak tak siam hi a bul tanna chauh a ni. Maximum engagement atana optimize dan tur chu hetiang hi a ni:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Platform tin hian mamawh leh ngaithlatute beisei dan bik an nei vek a:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Professional insights lam ngaihtuah la, industry keywords hmang la, form rei zawk pawm theih
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Messaging thui tak, hashtags strategically hmang, trending topics nena inzawm
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Visual content hian a ti tha hle a, khawtlang inrawlhna a fuih thin
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Visuals quality sang tak tak a pawimawh a, hashtags kaihhnawih hmang la, Engagement atan Stories hmang bawk ang che
optimizeContent.engagement1: I ngaithlatute tana hun remchang takah post reng rawh
optimizeContent.engagement2: I content-ah hian compelling calls-to-action hmang rawh
optimizeContent.engagement3: Comment te chhang la, i khawtlang nen inpawh rawh
optimizeContent.engagement4: Eng content nge perform tha ber tih hriatthiam nan analytics track rawh
optimizeContent.tip: Contentry-a scheduling feature hmang hian kut hmanga thawhrimna tel lovin hun tha ber berah post theih a ni.

brandDeals.intro: Brand partnership hi sum lakluhna lian tak a ni thei. I approach optimize dan tur chu hetiang hi a ni:
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Hun remchang a lo awm hunah inpeih reng ang che:
brandDeals.prep1: Professional, content portfolio inmil tak vawng reng rawh
brandDeals.prep2: I engagement metrics te chu track la, showcase rawh
brandDeals.prep3: I demographics leh reach te nen media kit siam rawh
brandDeals.prep4: Contentry hmangin sample branded content concept siam rawh
brandDeals.pitchingTitle: Brands te hnenah pitching a ni
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: I pitch te chu langsar takin siam rawh:
brandDeals.pitch1: I pitch chu brand value leh target audience nen align rawh
brandDeals.pitch2: Generic proposal aiin content idea bik pe rawh
brandDeals.pitch3: I content hian guidelines a zawm tih lantir nan compliance analysis te pawh telh bawk ang che
brandDeals.tip: Sponsored content siam hunah Contentry compliance checking hmang la, FTC leh platform disclosure requirement te a tlin theih nan.

influencerProfiles.intro: I Strategic Profile hi i content strategy dinna bulpui ber a ni. A optimize dan tur chu hetiang hi a ni:
influencerProfiles.setupTitle: I Profile Setting Up dan tur
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profile configure tha tak chuan consistent, on-brand content a tichiang a:
influencerProfiles.setup1: I niche leh target audience te chiang takin sawifiah rawh
influencerProfiles.setup2: I duhzawng ziakna tone leh style set rawh
influencerProfiles.setup3: I ngaithlatute tan culture leh regional ngaihtuahna te dah tel bawk ang che
influencerProfiles.setup4: I brand voice sawifiahtu reference document upload rawh
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: I profile siam that chhunzawm zel la, result tha zawk i hmu ang:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Generated content enfiah la, a tul angin profile settings siamrem rawh
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Campaign hrang hrang emaw audience hrang hrang tan profile tam tak siam rawh
influencerProfiles.optimize3: I Knowledge Base chu brand guidelines thar ber berte nen update reng ang che
influencerProfiles.tip: I Strategic Profile hi quarter tin enfiah la, i brand leh audience lo thang zel chu a lantir theih nan.

workflowsGuide.title: Hnathawh dan leh Scoring Guide
workflowsGuide.description: Scoring system hnathawh dan zir la, content analysis atanga approval thlenga workflow step tinte hrethiam rawh.

scoring.intro: Contentry-a scoring system hian i content kalphung hriatthiamna atan penalty-based scoring langtlang tak a pe a ni. Score zawng zawng hi 100 atanga tan a ni a, dan bawhchhiatna emaw, thil hmuhchhuah bik emaw avanga point lak chhuah a ni.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Overall score hi analysis factor zawng zawng weighted combination a ni a, 0 atanga 100 thleng a ni:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: A tha hle - Publish theih tura inpeih tawh, content pawh a tha hle
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: A tha - Chhuah hmain siamthatna tenau te rawt a ni
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Ngaihtuah ngai - Review leh siamthat ngai
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Thil pawimawh tak tak, chinfel a nih hma chuan chhuah loh tur
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Overall score-ah hian risk level atanga thlirin adaptive weighting hman a ni a:
scoring.overallCalc2: Risk sang tak (Thil zawm ≤60): (Thil zawm × 50%) + (Cultural × 30%) + (A dikna × 20%)
scoring.overallCalc4: Critical Risk (Compliance ≤40): A pumpuiah chuan 40 maximum-ah hard-capped a ni
scoring.componentsDesc: I score pumpui chu penalty-based system hmanga key component pathum atanga chhut a ni a:
scoring.component1: Compliance Score: 100 atanga tan a ni a, dan bawhchhiatna hmuhchhuah apiangin point a lakchhuah thin
scoring.component2: Cultural Sensitivity Score: Hofstede-a culture dimension 6 zinga a vaiin
scoring.component3: Accuracy Score: 100 atanga tan a ni a, dik lohna emaw issue hmuhchhuah apiangin point a deduct thin
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Post tin hi Compliance Score 100 hmanga tan a ni a, dan bawhchhiatna apiangah point lak chhuah a ni:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Critical Violation (-60 pts): NDA bawhchhiatna, thuruk info puan chhuah → tihtawp nghal theihna risk
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Severe Violation (-40 pts): Harsatna, inthliarna, huatna thu → Dan anga hmalakna hlauhawm
scoring.complianceSeverity3: High Violation (-25 pts): Advertisement puan chhuah loh, policy bawhchhia → Fines/suspension risk
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Moderate Violation (-10 pts): Tone dik lo, kaihhruaina atanga inthlak danglamna tenau → Training/warning
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Entirnan: Missing #ad (-25) + Tone issue (-10) = Final score 65 a ni
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Multiple violations stack - penalty tin hi cumulative-a hman a ni
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Checked violations: Thuruk info, Harassment, NDA bawhchhiatna, Thupuan bo, Policy bawhchhiatna, Tone dik lo
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Cultural score hi official Hofstede cultural dimension paruk (0-100 ve ve) atanga a zatve a ni:
scoring.culturalDim1: Power Distance: Formality, thuneihna zah vs. egalitarian, casual tone te a ni
scoring.culturalDim2: Individualism vs. Collectivism: ‘Kei/Keimah’ focus vs. ‘Keini/Keini’ khawtlang ngaih pawimawh
scoring.culturalDim3: Mipa leh Hmeichhia: Inelna/assertive vs. thawhhona/inremna tawng
scoring.culturalDim4: Uncertainty Avoidance: Dan, himna, chiang taka sawi ngaih pawimawh vs. thil chiang lo laka inhawng
scoring.culturalDim5: Long-Term Orientation: Nakin lawka lawmman ngaihtuah vs. hun rei lote chhunga hlawkna
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Optimistic/enjoyment vs. Thusawi hran/thunun theih
scoring.culturalCalc: Cultural Score = (Dimension score 6 atanga sum hmuh chhuah) ÷ 6
scoring.culturalRisk: Cultural Score 50 hnuai lam a tlak chuan khawvel pum huapa i brand humhim nan ‘Reputation Risk’ weighting hman a ni
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Post tin hi Accuracy Score 100 atanga tan a ni a, issue hmuhchhuah te tan point lakchhuah a ni:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Major Inaccuracy/Misinformation (-40 pts): Thu dik lo sawi, data siam chhuah
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Non-Credible Source (-20 pts): Thil rintlak lo atanga claim
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Thudik (fact-check) theih loh thusawi
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Entirnan: Thudik lo sawi (-40) + Source finfiah loh (-20) = Final score 40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Multiple issues stack - penalty tin hi cumulative-a hman a ni
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Content hi analysis result a zirin automatic in flag a ni:
scoring.flag1: Coverage tha (Green): Score 80 aia sang - chhuah theih tura inpeih
scoring.flag2: Ngaihtuah ngai (Yellow): Score 60-79 - hmasawnna tenau zawk siam a rawt
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Score 40-59 - tihchhuah hmain review a ngai
scoring.flag4: Critical Issues (Red): Score 40 hnuai lam - chinfel a nih hma chuan tihchhuah loh tur
scoring.disclosureTitle: Advertisement chungchanga thupuan chhuah dan enfiah
scoring.disclosureDesc: Promotional content atan chuan system hian hetiang hian a check bawk:
scoring.disclosure1: Is Promotional: Content hi advertisement emaw sponsored emaw a nih leh nih loh a hriat theih
scoring.disclosure2: Has Disclosure: #ad, #sponsored, emaw partnership puan chhuahna dik tak a enfiah thin
scoring.disclosure3: Regional Compliance: FTC (US), EU, leh Norway-a thupuan chhuah ngaite a finfiah
scoring.disclosure4: Thupuan bo hian Compliance Score-ah High Violation (-25 points) a thlen thin
scoring.tip: Content an zirchian apiangin score hi chhut nawn leh thin a ni. I message vawng reng chungin low-scoring content chu automatic-in tihchangtlun nan Rewrite feature hmang la.

analyze.intro: Analyze Content workflow hian i chhuah hmain content awmsa chu a zawm leh zawm loh, culture sensitivity leh quality a nih leh nih loh te evaluate turin a pui che a ni.
analyze.stepsDesc: I content thlirletna atan heng step te hi zawm rawh:
analyze.step1: Content Intelligence > Content thlirletna tab ah kal rawh
analyze.step2: I content chu text area ah paste emaw type emaw rawh
analyze.step3: I brand guidelines hman dan tur Strategic Profile thlang rawh
analyze.step4: AI hian visual a siam duh chuan duhthusamin ‘Generate accompanying image’ tih kha check la
analyze.step5: Analyze’ tih kha click la, analysis kimchang chu run rawh
analyze.type1: Compliance Check: Platform policy leh regulation (FTC, GDPR) nena inmil lo content a finfiah thin.
analyze.type2: Cultural Sensitivity: Mi tithinur thei emaw, culture lama insensitive lo emaw thil awm thei zawng zawng a scan thin
analyze.type3: Accuracy Verification: Claim leh facts dik leh dik loh a enfiah thin
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: I Strategic Profile kaihhruaina nen content a khaikhin thin
analyze.tip: 'Rewrite' button hmang hian 70 hnuai lam score chu automatic-in a ti ṭha ang a, AI hian i message a vawng reng chungin flagged issues chu a address ang.

generate.intro: Generate Content workflow hian AI hmangin i topic, platform mamawh leh brand guidelines a zirin content thar a siam thin.
generate.step1: Content Intelligence > Content siam chhuahna tab ah kal rawh
generate.step2: I topic kha ziak la, i siam duh chu sawi rawh
generate.step3: I target platform(s) leh writing tone te chu thlang rawh
generate.step4: Brand inmilna tur Strategic Profile thlang rawh
generate.step5: 'Generate' tih kha click la, AI hmanga siam content siam rawh
generate.optionsDesc: I generated content chu heng options hmang hian customize la:
generate.option1: Platform thlan dan: Platform pakhat emaw, a tam emaw (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram) thlang rawh
generate.option2: Thuziak Tone: Professional, Casual, Inspirational, emaw Informative emaw aṭangin thlang rawh
generate.option3: Content Length: I content atana target length kha siamrem rawh
generate.option4: Image Generation: Toggle on la, a kaihhnawih AI hmanga siam image siam rawh
generate.tip: Generated content chu siam zawhah automatic-in a analyze leh thin. Score te chu enfiah la, a tul chuan feedback button hmangin regenerate rawh.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt hmang hian hun bituk chhunga kal tur automated content generation set up theih a ni a, chu chuan i content calendar chu manual intervention tel lovin a full reng thei a ni.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Content siamtu tur prompt siam rawh:
schedulePrompt.step1: I content generation prompt chu topic leh preferences nen siam rawh
schedulePrompt.step2: Schedule frequency (nitin, kar tin, emaw ni bik emaw) set rawh .
schedulePrompt.step3: Content siam hun tur chu thlang rawh
schedulePrompt.step4: Generated content-ah analysis chu automatic-a kalpui turin 'Auto-analyze' enable rawh
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Scheduled Prompts atanga hlawkna awm thei
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Nitin kut hnathawh ngai lovin posting mumal tak vawng reng rawh
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Creative hour tha ber berah content siam rawh
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Review leh approval atan content backlog siam rawh
schedulePrompt.tip: Scheduled prompts hian i draft-ah content a siam chhuak thin. Quality a awm theih nan tihchhuah hmain enfiah leh pawm.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post hian i connected social media platform hrang hrangah automatic publishing atan approved content chu a hun tha ber berah queue theih a ni.
schedulePost.step1: Content view eng atang pawhin 'Publish Now' tih aiah 'Schedule' tih kha click la.
schedulePost.step2: Publishing tur i target date leh hun tur thlang rawh
schedulePost.step3: Eng connected social platform-ah nge publish tur tih thlang rawh
schedulePost.step4: Confirm la, i scheduled queue ah add rawh
schedulePost.optionsDesc: I scheduled post te kha configure rawh:
schedulePost.option1: Hun bik: Thuchhuah hun leh hun dik tak thlang rawh
schedulePost.option2: Hun Tha ber: AI hian engagement data hmanga posting hun tha ber tur rawtna siam rawh se
schedulePost.option3: Multi-Platform: Platform hrang hrangah content inang chu vawi khatah schedule theih a ni
schedulePost.warning: Scheduled post-ah chuan social media account connected pakhat tal a ngai a ni. Settings > Social Profiles ah account te chu connect rawh.

approval.intro: Approval Workflow hian content quality a tichiang a, a chhuah hmain manager-in a enfiah hmasa phawt a ngai a ni. Hei hi enterprise team leh regulated industry tan a pawimawh hle.
approval.processDesc: Approval workflow hmanga content a kal dan:
approval.step1: Creator chuan ‘Submit for Approval’ tih kha click-in content a submit thin.
approval.step2: Content chu manager-in Approval Queue-ah a rawn lang ang
approval.step3: Manager hian content, score leh analysis result te a enfiah thin
approval.step4: Manager chuan a thupui chu a pawm a, tihdanglam a dil a, a hnawl bawk
approval.statusesTitle: Approval Status te chu a ni
approval.status1: Draft: Content siam mek a ni a, submit a la ni lo
approval.status2: Pending Approval: Submit a ni a, manager review nghah mek a ni
approval.status3: Approved: Chhuah emaw, schedule emaw siam tura inpeih
approval.status4: Needs Revision: Manager chuan tihdanglam a dil - feedback enfiah la, submit leh rawh
approval.tip: Content i submit dawnin notes te dah la, reviewer te hnenah i creative decisions chungchangah context pe rawh. Hei hian approval process a ti chak hle.

confirmDelete.bulkMessage: {{count}} users te hi delete i duh em? He thiltih hi tihdanglam theih a ni lo.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Subscription tihtawp a ni
confirmCancelSubscription.message: He user subscription hi cancel i duh em? Premium features an hman theihna tur an hloh dawn a ni.

security.title: Security Settings te chu a hnuaia mi ang hian
security.description: I account security kha enkawl rawh

twoFactorAuth.title: Factor pahnih hmanga finfiahna
twoFactorAuth.description: I account ah hian security layer dang dah belh rawh
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: He QR code hi i authenticator app hmangin scan rawh
twoFactorAuth.enterCode: Digit 6 awmna code chu ziak lut rawh
twoFactorAuth.backupCodes: Backup Code hrang hrang a awm
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Heng code te hi hmun him takah save rawh. I authenticator i hloh chuan i account access nan i hmang thei ang.

passwordChange.passwordChanged: Password chu hlawhtling takin a thlak a

sessions.currentSession: Tuna Session neih mek a ni

platformSelector.aiWillOptimizePlural: AI hian {{count}} platform hrang hrang tan content a ti tha ang

postsTable.description: I post zawng zawng kha enkawl la, review vek rawh

actions.submitForApproval: Approval atan thehluh tur a ni

emptyState.noPosts: Post hmuh tur a awm lo
emptyState.createFirst: A bul tan nan i post hmasa ber siam rawh

gdpr.cookieDescription: I browsing experience tihchangtlun nan, personalized content kan rawn pe a, kan traffic thlirlet nan cookies kan hmang thin. "Accept All" i click chuan cookies kan hman hi i remti tihna a ni. I duhzawng chu i duh angin i siam thei a, cookies pawimawh lo chu i hnawl thei bawk.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: Kan Privacy Policy hi chhiar la
gdpr.customizePreferences: Preferences te chu a duh angin siam rawh
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Authentication, security, leh basic functionality atan a mamawh. Disable theih a ni lo.
gdpr.analyticsCookies: Analytics Cookies te a awm bawk
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Kan service tihchangtlun nan tlawhtute’n kan platform nena an inzawmna hriatthiamna min pui ang che.
gdpr.marketingCookies: Marketing Cookies te pawh a awm
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Mimal advertisement pek chhuah leh campaign hlawhtlinna tehna atana hman thin.
